snippet: President Giorgio Napolitano signed an emergency law to tackle environmental crimes and the damage produced by the illegal dumping or burning of waste.
abstract: Italian Pres Giorgio Napolitano signs emergency law to tackle environmental crimes and damage produced by illegal dumping or burning of waste in southern region of Campania.
lead_paragraph: President Giorgio Napolitano signed an emergency law to tackle environmental crimes and the damage produced by the illegal dumping or burning of waste.
